Scripts.OnClick: if (this:GetChecked()) then XtraUnitFrameExtraSettings["XufEnabled"] = "enabled" else XtraUnitFrameExtraSettings["XufEnabled"] = "disabled" end
if (XtraUnitFrameExtraSettings["AutoReload"] == "enabled" and Xuf.ProfilIsSaved == "true") then ReloadUI() else XtraUnitFrameUI:Hide() end

if UnitIsPartyLeader("player") or IsRaidOfficer() then Xuf:SendSyncToRaid() DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage("|cffead454Xckbucl |rXtraUnitFrame |cfffbb034|||r Profil [|cfffbb034"..XtraUnitFrameProfil.."|r] Sync to Raid Done.") else DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage("|cFFFF8000You need to be Raid Promoted, Raid Leader or In Raid.") end

Scripts.OnLoad: local cb_init_fn = function() local info for k,v in pairs(Xuf.ProfilNameSaved) do info = {} info.text = v info.value = v info.func = function() UIDropDownMenu_SetSelectedID(XUFMainSettingsDropDownProfils, this:GetID(), 0); end UIDropDownMenu_AddButton(info) end end UIDropDownMenu_Initialize(this, cb_init_fn)

Scripts.OnClick: XtraUnitFrameProfil = Xuf.ProfilNameSaved[UIDropDownMenu_GetSelectedID(XUFMainSettingsDropDownProfils)] if(UIDropDownMenu_GetSelectedID(XUFMainSettingsDropDownProfils) ~= nil) then Xuf:LoadSettingsInUI() DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage("|cffead454Xckbucl |rXtraUnitFrame |cfffbb034|||r XtraUnitFrame Profil [|cfffbb034"..Xuf.ProfilNameSaved[UIDropDownMenu_GetSelectedID(XUFMainSettingsDropDownProfils)].."|r] Loaded.") else DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage("|cFFFF7F00No Profil Selected.") end
